page.title: 13Strensall Children's Games
page.content: Games played by{7-11 year olds}at the primary school. Popularity of games is shown as a percentage of the total votes cast. {Boys:}Football 31%, Chasing games 26%, Pretend games such as 'Soldiers' 11%, Hide and Seek 10%, Ball games 7%, Cricket 5%, Cycling 4%, Marbles 1%. Racing, go-carting, rugby, darts, boxing and roller skating polled under 1% each. {Girls:} Chasing games 24%, Handstanding 20%, Pretend games such as 'Mums and Dads' 19%, Hide and Seek 18%, Football 5%, Cycling 3%, Marbles, netball, ball games and racing 2% each, Dancing, Leap frog and roller skating 1% each. Chasing games included 'Tig' and a variation called 'Stick in Mud'. Ball games included Catch, Piggy in the Middle and Queenie where someone has to guess who has the ball when the others ask 'Queenie, who has the ball?
